name: RO
author: The one and only Praixie
Crobat
Espeon
Arcanine
Fate Testarossa
Amane Ohtori
summary: Ragnarok Online. Tips have been added! Type /changelog for updates. New to this theme? Check out RO's theme guide! http://pokemon-online.eu/threads/theme-guides.30711/#post-433860

sides.winmsg: ±Game: ~Players~ saved Rune Midgard's cities from being invaded by those fearsome monsters!
±Game: ~Players~ beat all those humans and said-to-be powerful monsters and have shown Rune Midgard the real power of bug monsters!
±Game: From Glast Heim, ~Players~ took control of every dust of Rune Midgard.
±Game: Descendant from the heavens, at Schwatzwald, ~Players~ stopped the war, claiming that it was Odin's will.

tips: Acolyte: In games of 12 or more, Priest is preferred (for the sake of protecting other PRs). For games of 11 or fewer, Monk is preferred.

Ninja: On Day 1, once the Baphomet has daykilled someone, reveal yourself to connect PRs. Once all PRs are connected and/or the village is starting to dwindle, convert to Buff Ninja to take out a mafia role.
New to this theme?: Check out this guide for more tips: http://pokemon-online.eu/threads/theme-guides.30711/#post-433860

roles.help: You're a newbie in Ragnarok Online. Help the village by voting during the day. In addition you can change into a Power Role by typing /change [your name]. Note that this has only 5% chance of success. However, starting on the third night, you can type /super to change into a Super Novice.
roles.info: Can change into one of the first job classes (5% success). Can change into a Super Novice on the third night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

change.convertmsg: A Novice has changed jobs and is now a/an ~New~.

super.convertmsg: A Novice has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

roles.help: You're a newbie in Ragnarok Online. Help the village by voting during the day. In addition you can change into a Power Role by typing /change [your name]. Note that this has only 5% chance of success. However, you can type /super to change into a Super Novice.
roles.info: Can change into one of the first job classes (5% success). Can change into a Super Novice. Sided with Rune Midgard.

change.convertmsg: A Novice has changed jobs and is now a/an ~New~.

super.convertmsg: A Novice has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

roles.help: You're a newbie in Ragnarok Online. Help the village by voting during the day. In addition you can change into a Power Role by typing /change [your name]. Note that this has only 5% chance of success. However, starting on the third night, you can type /super to change into a Super Novice.
roles.info: Sees itself as Novice. Can change into a Super Novice on the third night (dummy commands that won't work). Reveals as Mistress when inspected. Sided with Rune Midgard.

change.convertmsg: A Poring has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

super.convertmsg: A Poring has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

roles.help: You're a newbie in Ragnarok Online. Help the village by voting during the day. In addition you can change into a Power Role by typing /change [your name]. Note that this has only 5% chance of success. However, starting on the third night, you can type /super to change into a Super Novice.
roles.info: Sees itself as Novice. Can change into a Super Novice on the third night (dummy commands that won't work). Reveals as Valk Randgris when inspected. Sided with Rune Midgard.

change.convertmsg: A Poporing has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

super.convertmsg: A Poporing has changed jobs and is now a ~New~.

roles.help: You are now a Super Novice and can use almost every skill available to first job characters! You can use each and every one of these commands ONCE a game: /distract, /protect, and /inspect.
roles.info: Can distract one person during the night once a game. Can protect one person during the night once a game. Can inspect one person during the night once a game. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: You are now a Super Novice and can use almost every skill available to first job characters! You can use each and every one of these commands ONCE a game: /distract, /protect, and /inspect.
roles.info: Can distract one person during the night once a game. Can protect one person during the night once a game. Can inspect one person during the night once a game. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: With strong physical attacks, defense, and a sense of command, a Swordsman can become a headstrong leader to others. Because you are so stubborn, you'll bring with you your attacker when you die at night. You can also change to 2nd job class starting the second night by typing /knight (revealing daykiller) or /crusader (non-revealing daykiller once every 2 days).
roles.info: Revenges all nightkills. Can change to either Knight or Crusader on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

knight.convertmsg: A Swordsman has changed jobs and is now a Knight.

crusader.convertmsg: A Swordsman has changed jobs and is now a Crusader.

roles.help: The Acolyte is a support class that uses skills to help protect their allies. You can protect other player during the night by typing /protect [name]. You can also change to 2nd job class starting the second night by typing /priest (protect + safeguard on two persons) or /monk (protect + 1-time revealing daykill).
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night. Can change to either Priest or Monk on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

priest.convertmsg: An Acolyte has changed jobs and is now a Priest.

monk.convertmsg: An Acolyte has changed jobs and is now a Monk.

roles.help: With high MP as a mage, you can only inspect (/inspect) someone during the night. Starting the second night, you can type /wizard [your name] (Inspect every night + kill every 2 nights) or /sage [your name] (revealing exposer that evades daykills) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night. Can change to either Wizard or Sage on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

wizard.convertmsg: A Mage has changed jobs and is now a Wizard

sage.convertmsg: A Mage has changed jobs and is now a Sage

roles.help: The archer can shoot arrows from long distances. You can immobilize someone during the night by typing /shoot [target]. Starting on the second night, you can type /hunter (vigilante), /bard (2 distracts every night, 1 with a 50% fail chance that is revealed to everyone), or /dancer (2 distracts, 1 every other night that is revealed to everyone) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Can shoot (distract) one person during the night. Can change to either Hunter, Bard, or Dancer on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

hunter.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Hunter.

dancer.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Dancer.

bard.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Bard.

roles.help: A thief can hide in the night so you have a chance to know who the killers are. Starting on the second night, you can type /assassin (spy + poison + 50% evasion on nightkills) or /rogue (spy with more hax + stalk) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Gets hax on kill and poison. Can change to either Assassin or Rogue on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

assassin.convertmsg: A Thief has changed jobs and is now an Assassin.

rogue.convertmsg: A Thief has changed jobs and is now a Rogue.

roles.help: Always on the lookout for profit, Merchants are the economic experts of Ragnarok Online. Because of Enlarge Weight limit, your vote counts as 2. Starting on the second night, you can change to 2nd job class by typing /smith (+3 votes) or /alchemist (1.01 vote + kills first voter when lynched).
roles.info: A mayor with +2 vote. Can change to either Blacksmith or Alchemist on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

smith.convertmsg: A Merchant has changed jobs and is now a Blacksmith.

alchemist.convertmsg: A Merchant has changed jobs and is now an Alchemist.

roles.help: With strong physical attacks, defense, and a sense of command, a Swordsman can become a headstrong leader to others. Because you are so stubborn, you'll bring with you your attacker when you die at night. You can also change to 2nd job class by typing /knight (revealing daykiller) or /crusader (non-revealing daykiller once every 2 days).
roles.info: Revenges all nightkills. Can change to either Knight or Crusader. Sided with Rune Midgard.

knight.convertmsg: A Swordsman has changed jobs and is now a Knight.

crusader.convertmsg: A Swordsman has changed jobs and is now a Crusader.

roles.help: The Acolyte is a support class that uses skills to help protect their allies. You can protect other player during the night by typing /protect [name]. You can also change to 2nd job class by typing /priest (protect + safeguard on two persons) or /monk (protect + 1-time revealing daykill).
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night. Can change to either Priest or Monk. Sided with Rune Midgard.

priest.convertmsg: An Acolyte has changed jobs and is now a Priest.

monk.convertmsg: An Acolyte has changed jobs and is now a Monk.

roles.help: With high MP as a mage, you can only inspect (/inspect) someone during the night. You can type /wizard [your name] (Inspect every night + kill every 2 nights) or /sage [your name] (revealing exposer that evades daykills) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night. Can change to either Wizard or Sage. Sided with Rune Midgard.

wizard.convertmsg: A Mage has changed jobs and is now a Wizard

sage.convertmsg: A Mage has changed jobs and is now a Sage

roles.help: The archer can shoot arrows from long distances. You can immobilize someone during the night by typing /shoot [target]. You can type /hunter (vigilante), /bard (2 distracts every night, 1 with a 50% fail chance that is revealed to everyone), or /dancer (2 distracts, 1 every other night that is revealed to everyone) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Can shoot (distract) one person during the night. Can change to either Hunter, Bard, or Dancer. Sided with Rune Midgard.

hunter.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Hunter.

dancer.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Dancer.

bard.convertmsg: An Archer has changed jobs and is now a Bard.

roles.help: A thief can hide in the night so you have a chance to know who the killers are. You can type /assassin (spy + poison + 50% evasion on nightkills) or /rogue (spy with more hax + stalk) to advance to second job.
roles.info: Gets hax on kill and poison. Can change to either Assassin or Rogue. Sided with Rune Midgard.

assassin.convertmsg: A Thief has changed jobs and is now an Assassin.

rogue.convertmsg: A Thief has changed jobs and is now a Rogue.

roles.help: Always on the lookout for profit, Merchants are the economic experts of Ragnarok Online. Because of Enlarge Weight limit, your vote counts as 2. You can change to 2nd job class by typing /smith (+3 votes) or /alchemist (1.01 vote + kills first voter when lynched).
roles.info: A mayor with +2 vote. Can change to either Blacksmith or Alchemist. Sided with Rune Midgard.

smith.convertmsg: A Merchant has changed jobs and is now a Blacksmith.

alchemist.convertmsg: A Merchant has changed jobs and is now an Alchemist.

roles.help: You gain masteries to wield new types of weapons. You can utilize your spear skills to kill someone during standby. You will be revealed if you do so be careful.
roles.info: A revealing daykiller. Sided with Rune Midgard.

kill.msg: You can now kill using /kill [target]! You will be revealed!
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ (Knight) uses brandish spear with overwhelming power to crush ~Target~.

roles.help: Crusaders are a fine blend of physical strength and faith-driven magic prowess. Annihilate the demons by typing /kill [target] once every 2 days. This will not reveal you because of the blinding light of Holy Cross.
roles.info: A non-revealing daykiller once every 2 days. Sided with Rune Midgard.

kill.msg: You can now kill using /kill [target]! You won't be revealed!
kill.killmsg: A crusader has passed judgment on ~Target~, engulfing him with the divine light, Holy Cross.

roles.help: The Priest can support his allies by healing them and providing buffs. You can protect and safeguard two players by typing /heal [name]
roles.info: Can heal (protect and safeguard) two people during the night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: With strong body and mind, the monk has access to spirit skills and devastating combos. You can still protect someone by typing /protect [name]. Once per game, you can kill during the standby by typing /asura [name]. Note that this will reveal you so be careful.
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night. Can asura (kill) one person during the day (reveals user) once a game. Sided with Rune Midgard.

asura.msg: You can now kill using /asura [target]! You will be revealed and you can only do this once.
asura.killmsg: ~Self~ (Monk) uses Summon Spirit Sphere! Fury! ASURA STRIKE!!! ~Target~ just got OWNED.

roles.help: Wizards are powerful offensive magic users. You can still /inspect every night and can now kill every 2 nights. Type /jupitel [target] to do so.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night. Can jupitel (kill) one person every other night. Sided with the Rune Midgard.

roles.help: Sages use books and their knowledge to fight monsters. You can expose by typing /expose [name] during standby. You will be revealed. Your vast knowledge allows you to evade all daykills!
roles.info: Can expose someone during standby (reveals user). Evades daykills. Sided with Rune Midgard.

expose.msg: You can type /expose [name] to reveal someone's role! You will be revealed.
expose.exposemsg: ~Self~, the sage, uses his Sight skill to expose ~Target~...... ~Target~ is the ~Role~!!!!!

daykill.msg: ~Target~ was able to read your attack and dodge it with ease!
daykill.targetmsg: Someone tried to kill you, but your vast knowledge allowed you to read and easily dodge their attack!

roles.help: Hunters have their falcon to help them in killing. Type /blitz [target] to kill someone during the night.
roles.info: Can blitz (kill) one person during the night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: Bards utilize musical instruments to perform. Type /sing [name] to distract someone during the night. You can also type /freeze to distract another player (50% chance to fail). This will be known to everyone.
roles.info: Can sing (distract) one person during the night. Can freeze (distract) one person during the night (50% fail chance, will be known to everyone). Sided with the Rune Midgard.

freeze.dummybroadcastmsg: A ~Role~ uses his Frost Joke skill to freeze ~Target~ during the night.

roles.help: Dancers cultivates their rhythm and balance qualities to dance with the tune. Type /dance [name] to distract someone during the night. You can also type /scream to distract another player every other night. This will be known to everyone.
roles.info: Can dance (distract) one person during the night. Can scream (distract) one person every other night (will be known to everyone). Sided with the Rune Midgard.

scream.dummybroadcastmsg: A ~Role~ uses her Scream skill to stun ~Target~ during the night.

roles.help: Assassins have a variety of damage dealing and poisoning skills. You can poison during the night by typing /venom [name]. You have a chance to hax kills and poison. Also, an assassin has a 50% chance to evade nightkills because of his agility and luck.
roles.info: Gets hax on kill and poison. Can venom (poison) one person during the night. Has a 50% chance to evade nightkills. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: Rogues are the lurkers from the shadows. As such they can hax kills and poison. You can also use /stalk during the night to know who they visited during the night.
roles.info: Gets moderate hax on kill and poison. Can stalk one person during the night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: You are currently forging a weapon so you don't involve yourself in fighting now. However, your vote counts as +3 so vote wisely.
roles.info: A mayor with +3 vote. Sided with Rune Midgard.

roles.help: You are currently making some potions so you don't involve yourself in fighting now. However, your vote counts as 1.01 now. If you still get lynched, the first one who votes you will die as well.
roles.info: A mayor with 1.01 vote. If lynched, kills the first person who voted them. Sided with Rune Midgard.

killVoters.message: ~Target~ accidentally messed with the alchemist potions and died as well.

roles.help: You have access on the Cicada Skin Shed skill thus you can evade night and day kills with 40% chance. You can use /cicada during standby to reveal yourself and connect the power roles. You have a vote of 0. Starting on the second night, you can type /soul [your name] to buff up (get a nightkill) but you will lose your evasion.
roles.info: Has a 40% chance to evade nightkills. Has a 40% chance to evade daykills. Can cicada (reveal) self during standby. Vote counts as 0. Can change to Buffed Ninja on the second night. Sided with Rune Midgard.

cicada.revealmsg: From the shadows, a ninja uses Cicada Skin Shed skill to evade kills. ~Self~, the Ninja, taunts anyone to kill him now.

soul.convertmsg: A Ninja uses his Soul skill to prepare his Final Strike

roles.help: You have access on the Cicada Skin Shed skill thus you can evade night and day kills with 40% chance. You can use /cicada during standby to reveal yourself and connect the power roles. You have a vote of 0. You can type /soul [your name] to buff up (get a nightkill) but you will lose your evasion.
roles.info: Has a 40% chance to evade nightkills. Has a 40% chance to evade daykills. Can cicada (reveal) self during standby. Vote counts as 0. Can change to Buffed Ninja. Sided with Rune Midgard.

cicada.revealmsg: From the shadows, a ninja uses Cicada Skin Shed skill to evade kills. ~Self~, the Ninja, taunts anyone to kill him now.

soul.convertmsg: A Ninja uses his Soul skill to prepare his Final Strike

roles.help: You can now use your ultimate skill, Final Strike to kill anyone at will. Type /strike to do so; this kill outspeeds bodyguards. You can't be distracted. However, there is a high chance (95%) that you will die after using this since it will consume your HP.
roles.info: Can strike (kill) one person during the night, outspeeding bodyguards, once a game (95% suicide chance). Can't be distracted. Sided with Rune Midgard.

strike.suicidemsg: The Final Strike consumes almost all of your HP less 1 but a rock come flying towards you and you still died.

roles.help: You're the demon monster from the abyss that appears in the churchyard. You can only /kill during the night. You can change your role by typing /change [your name]. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can change to Dark Lord. Sided with Demon Mafia.

roles.help: You're now an MVP monster with an extra inspect to know your enemies. Type /kill to kill a player. In addition, you can type /inspect to know someone's role. You now have a vote of 1.1. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can inspect one person during the night. Has a vote of 1.1. Sided with Demon Mafia.

roles.help: You're still a little baphomet wielding a mini scythe. Type /kill to kill a player during the night. You can type /change [your name] to become a Baphomet (can daykill twice a day; first kill does not reveal you, second kill reveals you), or you can type /unseal [your name] to become an Unsealed Baphomet (can kill twice at night; the second kill is unshared and has a good chance of being haxed). Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can change to Baphomet or Unsealed Baphomet. Sided with Demon Mafia.

roles.help: You're now at the battlefield. You can /kill to kill during the day and you won't be revealed! You can also /slice during the day to kill a second person, but this will reveal you! Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the day (does not reveal user). Can slice (kill) one person during the day (reveals user). Sided with Demon Mafia.

kill.msg: You can now kill using /kill [target]! You won't be revealed!
kill.killmsg: The Baphomet uses his giant scythe to slash ~Target~...

slice.msg: You can also use /slice [target] to kill a second person, but this will reveal you!
slice.killmsg: ~Self~ slowly approaches ~Target~ and slices them in half with his giant scythe...

roles.help: You're now at the battlefield. You can /kill during the night and /kill during the day and you won't be revealed!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can kill one person during the day (does not reveal user). Sided with Demon Mafia.

kill.msg: You can now kill using /kill [target]! You won't be revealed!
kill.killmsg: The Baphomet uses his giant scythe to slash ~Target~...

roles.help: You're now at the battlefield, and can still /kill during the night. You can also /slash another person to kill them; this kill is unshared, but it has a good chance of being haxed. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can slash (unshared kill, good chance of being haxed) one person during the night. Sided with Demon Mafia.

roles.help: The Valkyrie is the guardian of Odin temple. It is really a fast killer with various skills. You can type /kill during the night. You can ignore any distracts. You can also type /change [your name] to become Valkyrie Randgris, a killer that outspeeds protect. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can't be distracted. Can change to Valk Randgris. Sided with Odin Mafia.

distract.msg: Someone tried to distract you during the night but you ignore him/her instead.

roles.help: The Valkyrie Randgris is one of the strongest MVP that can even outspeed protect. You can type /kill during the night. You ignore any distractors. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night, outspeeding bodyguards. Can't be distracted. Sided with Odin Mafia.

distract.msg: Someone tried to distract you during the night but you ignore him/her instead.

roles.help: You're the one of those annoying bugs summoned by the great Mistress. You can only /kill during the night. You can change your role by typing /change [your name]. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can change to Mistress. Sided with Insect Mafia.

roles.help: The Mistress is the queen of the hornets and a distracting MVP. You can /kill and /distract anyone during the night. The /distract is not shared, so any other Mistresses on your team should pick a different target to distract! Every other night, you can /demote one person during the night to change them into their previous class! Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can distract (unshared) one person during the night. Can demote (convert) one person during the night to their previous class every other night. Sided with Insect Mafia.

demote.convertmsg: A/an ~Old~ has been demoted to a/an ~New~!

roles.help: The thief bugs are small cockroach-like monsters that dominate the prontera sewers. Type /kill to kill a player during the night. You can type /change to become Golden Thief Bug (keeps the /kill and can also /poison), /male to become Male Thief Bug (keeps the /kill and can also /protect), or /female to become Female Thief Bug (keeps the /kill and can /egg itself every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield). Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can change to Golden Thief Bug, Male Thief Bug, or Female Thief Bug. Sided with Insect Mafia.

roles.help: The Golden Thief Bug is the leader of the thief bugs. You have a separate poison by typing /poison [target] as well as a nightly kill with /kill [target]. You have a chance to find who can Heal. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can poison one person during the night. Gets medium hax on heal. Sided with Insect Mafia.

roles.help: The Male Thief Bug is aggressive, so you can /kill at night. The Male Thief Bug is very protective of its mate and larvae, so you can also /protect one person at night. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can protect one person during the night. Sided with Insect Mafia.

roles.help: The Female Thief Bug cares for its eggs and will attack anyone that threatens them by using /kill during the night. You can also lay an egg to protect yourself by using /egg [your name] every other night. Each time you use /egg, you will gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield (can be used up to 4 times). Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can egg (convert) itself during the night every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield (maximum of 4 eggs). Sided with Insect Mafia.

egg.convertmsg: The Female Thief Bug has laid an egg!

roles.help: You have laid an egg, so you now have a 15% chance to evade nightkills and a -1 voteshield! You can /kill at night and /egg [your name] every other night to gain an additional 15% nightkill evasion and -1 voteshield. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can egg (convert) itself during the night every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield. Has a 15% chance to evade nightkills. Has a voteshield of -1. Sided with Insect Mafia.

egg.convertmsg: The Female Thief Bug has laid an egg!

roles.help: You have laid 2 eggs, so you now have a 30% chance to evade nightkills and a -2 voteshield! You can /kill at night and /egg [your name] every other night to gain an additional 15% nightkill evasion and -1 voteshield. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can egg (convert) itself during the night every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield. Has a 30% chance to evade nightkills. Has a voteshield of -2. Sided with Insect Mafia.

egg.convertmsg: The Female Thief Bug has laid an egg!

roles.help: You have laid 3 eggs, so you now have a 45% chance to evade nightkills and a -3 voteshield! You can /kill at night and /egg [your name] every other night to gain an additional 15% nightkill evasion and -1 voteshield. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can egg (convert) itself during the night every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield. Has a 45% chance to evade nightkills. Has a voteshield of -3. Sided with Insect Mafia.

egg.convertmsg: The Female Thief Bug has laid an egg!

roles.help: You have laid 4 eggs, so you now have a 60% chance to evade nightkills and a -4 voteshield! You can /kill at night, but you can't lay any more eggs. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Has a 60% chance to evade nightkills. Has a voteshield of -4. Sided with Insect Mafia.

roles.help: Thanatos is a ghost of a warrior that rests at the top of the Thana Tower. You have a vote of 99, so whoever you vote for will be lynched. You can also inspect during the night by typing /inspect. Type /tt to talk with your team.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night. Vote of 99. Sided with Odin Mafia.

changelog.2.7.2014: Teamtalk added. Valkyrie and Valk Randgris ignore distractors instead of killing them. Appears in small games instead of Dark Illusion. Dark Lord has a vote of 1.1. Rogue stalks every night. Bard is no longer a day bomb but has 2 distracts now. New role: Dancer. Hoping to add a new mafia team.
changelog.7.25.2014: Baphomet's daykill no longer has a chance to reveal.
changelog.7.26.2014: Poring and Poporing can change into mafia roles (the same way Novices can change into first class jobs). All first class jobs (Acolyte, Archer, Mage, Merchant, Ninja, Swordsman, Thief) can't change into second class jobs until the second night. Novices can now change into Super Novices (1x distract, 1x protect, 1x inspect) on the third night. Bard's freeze (distract) fail chance increased from 30% to 50%. Prevent Teamvote added. Alchemist's vote changed from -3 to 1.01. Priority list changed a bit: Mistress's distract is now faster than Bard's /sing and Dancer's /dance but still slower than Bard's /freeze and Dancer's /scream. Assassin's /venom priority increased to be the same as Golden Thief Bug's poison (outspeeds all kills except Valk Randgris and Buffed Ninja). Adjusted spawn list a bit as well. Dark Illusion spawns at 11 (instead of 12), while Mage spawns at 12 (instead of 11).
changelog.7.28.2014: Tips added. Update Team added. Increased Golden Thief Bug's hax on heal. Sage now evades all daykills.
changelog.8.4.2014: Novices that successfully change into a 1st job class can change into a 2nd job class the next night.
changelog.8.5.2014: Poring and Poporing now have their actual roles shown on Current Roles. They still see themselves as Novices and will reveal as Mistress (Poring) and Valk Randgris (Poporing) when inspected.
changelog.8.7.2014: Rogue no longer has a 20% chance to evade nightkills. Assassin now has a chance to hax kills and poison (same chance as Thief, lower chance than Rogue).
changelog.8.28.2014: Thanatos's inspect's accuracy increased from 50% to 100% (always right now). Bapho Jr. can change to either Fire Baphomet (2 daykills per day; the first doesn't reveal, the second reveals) or Shadow Baphomet (2 kills per night; the second is unshared but has a good chance of being haxed). Thief Bug can change to Male Thief Bug (protect) or Female Thief Bug (convert itself every other night to gain 15% nightkill evasion and a -1 voteshield); it can still change into Golden Thief Bug as well. Mistress can convert one person to their previous class every other night (lowest priority of the game, can be blocked by Priest's /heal; Thanatos and Super Novices that were Poring or Poporing can't be demoted). Poring and Poporing can no longer change to mafia. Instead, they change to Super Novices whose commands are dummy (will fail).
changelog.9.21.2014: Added demoted Merchant to VCLR. Both Archer's shoot (distract) and Super Novice's distract now have a lower priority than Mistress's distract. Fire Baphomet is renamed Baphomet, while Shadow Baphomet is renamed Unsealed Baphomet.
changelog.5.24.2015: Increased Assassin's chance to evade nightkills to 50%. Increased Rogue's hax on kills and poisons.
